subject: Fwd: Website working excel
preview: @jaime thank you! The only outstanding task is the one for the 'down arrow' which Glen is working on. I'm going to close the ticket now. Cheers

full_threads.body:
@jaime thank you! 

The only outstanding task is the one for the 'down arrow' which Glen is working on. I'm going to close the ticket now. Cheers

@heath hello heath, here's our progress/updates for this task, we place it in google docs, I already invited you, you can check your email
or in this link https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hjbOkZmLkWYWzHY5CSOz-Y7-smWb9pAk2hTACwhfz_c/edit?usp=sharing

let me know if we have other concerns. thanks 😉

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

Begin forwarded message:

From: Keenan Druce | Acoufelt <keenan.druce@acoufelt.com>
Date: 13 January 2022 at 15:31:43 AEDT
To: Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Website working excel

﻿

Hey Heath,


Thanks for your last round of updates, the team and I have gone through and noticed a few things that are still incorrect. I have also attached my PDF from last year with some issues still outstanding and below I've written a list of some minor adjustments we need updating.


If some of these have already been done, please ignore.


FilaSorb Page

  • Acoustic spectrum 'button' change to 'LEARN MORE' and link to the 'FULL COLOR' page

QuietBack Page

  • Learn More button needs say 'Download brochure' and update brochure to be 'QuietBack brochure' not the QuietPrint
  • Increase the line height on 'traditional methods etc' to 58


BarrierBack Page

  • Learn More button needs say 'Download brochure' and update brochure to be 'BarrierBack brochure'


QuietPrint Page

  • Design section showing 'BarrierBack' designs
  • Learn More button needs say 'Download brochure' and update brochure to be 'QuietPrint brochure'
  • Increase the line height on 'traditional methods etc' to 58

WBQ Page

  • Design section showing 'BarrierBack' designs
  • Key Feature icons some of them are displaying 'white' instead of 'black'
  • Let us help you get started section 'button' isn't aligned to the centre of the page


BarrierBack Pages (Argentium, Flow, Elevate & Satellite)

  • Add the'QuickShip' symbol above the QuickShip text in the drop down, this has been done for 'QuietBack'


Carpet Product Pages (ALL)

  • Add one more drop down below 'NRC' which says 'Installation Method' see XD link for design
    https://xd.adobe.com/view/e90e2079-504b-41aa-ad35-36ddafe52617-bc5d/screen/f5952dbd-f32e-4e3b-8082-7c0ab02616a3/


FAQ

  • Remove white background on the FAQ options (see screenshot)


Product Portal Page

  • 'VIEW COLLECTION' can you change all to black
  • Under carpet tiles not all the products are appearing


Whole Site

  • All pages with a hero image minus the home page can we integrated an animated arrow (slightly jumping up and down) to indicate to the user to scroll down (attached is the arrow design)


Warm regards,

Keenan Druce

Graphic Designer



T +61 1800 626 462

Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com



From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 12 January 2022 at 5:02 pm
To: Keenan Druce | Acoufelt <keenan.druce@acoufelt.com>
Subject: Re: Website working excel


[EXTERNAL]This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.

Sure, confirming we have made these changes now too :)


Thanks and speak soon,



‌



Heath Maguire

Creative Director

Phone: 1300 072 134

Wolf IQ

Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

wolfiq.com.au

And lastly, can you add the video back in on the image that has the 'play button' on it. I've linked the current page which the video appears, if this can be done the same way as it currently is that would be great - https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/

On 5 Nov 2021, at 6:02 pm, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com> wrote:

Hey Heath,

Here's the link to our working, live web project excel. Take some time to run through each of the tabs to get a feel for where and how we're housing everything.

<image001.png> Revised web menu navigation 2021.xlsx

All of our product information, images and download links (which I believe you will be working on next week) are under the 'Products - Carpet', 'Products - Wall' and 'Products - Ceiling' tabs. This is 95% ready for your team, we're just making a few tweaks to some downloads on Monday, and will have final links ready by EOD. We'll also work on some design concepts for the 'Full Color' page with the additional thicknesses.

Will wait til you and your team have completed your project planning to determine what our focus/key tasks for the remainder of the week should be.

Am sure you'll have plenty of questions, so feel free to give us a buzz on Mon or Tues.

Thanks Heath, and have a great weekend!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager
